definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items

sentences.english: All above offers are bound by relevant terms and conditions.
sentences.chinese: 以上所有優惠須受有關條款及細則約束。

sentences.english: Environmental protection departments under the State Council shall be held responsible for the interpretation of This Bylaw .
sentences.chinese: 本細則由國務院環境保護部門負責解釋。

sentences.english: Article 32. Environmental protection departments under the State Council shall be held responsible for the interpretation of This Bylaw .
sentences.chinese: 第三十二條本細則由國務院環境保護部門負責解釋。

sentences.english: Other Royal Supermarket terms and conditions apply (Available in Traditional Chinese only ).
sentences.chinese: 須受其他來來超級市場條款及細則約束。

sentences.english: Could we discuss the terms and conditions of the new job?
sentences.chinese: 我們能不能談一下新工作的條款和細則？

sentences.english: The explanation rights of the above details belongs to our company and the cruise company.
sentences.chinese: 以上細則的解釋權歸屬我公司及遊船公司。

sentences.english: Article 50 These rules shall come into effect from the day they are promulgated.
sentences.chinese: 第五十條本實施細則自發布之日起施行。

sentences.english: This company reserves the right to interpret the Scoring Rules.
sentences.chinese: 積分細則解釋權歸本公司所有。

sentences.english: Article 58 The detailed rules shall come into effect from the date of promulgation.
sentences.chinese: 第五十八條本實施細則自發布之日起施行。

sentences.english: Please retain the Terms and Conditions for future reference.
sentences.chinese: 申請人須保留此條款及細則以作日後參考之用。

sentences.english: Article 57 The present Rules shall be implemented from the date of their promulgation.
sentences.chinese: 第五十七條本實施細則自發布之日起施行。

sentences.english: This Code of Practice and its revisions will be implemented after being passed at the Academic Affairs Meeting.
sentences.chinese: 本細則經教務會議通過後實施，修正時亦同。

sentences.english: C12.07 Duties of congregation committees shall be specified in the bylaws.
sentences.chinese: 各委員會的職責在細則及延伸議案中闡明。

sentences.english: The enquiry is clearly stated with all relevant details at this stage.
sentences.chinese: 有關詢價項目和細則，均清楚列明。

sentences.english: Pine Valley pay system developed implementation details.
sentences.chinese: 制定華彬莊園薪酬體系實施細則。

sentences.english: Article 114 These Implementation Rules shall go into effect as of the date of promulgation.
sentences.chinese: 第一百一十四條本細則自發布之日起施行。

definition: to set/to designate/to stipulate/to provide/to draw up/to formulate (rules etc)/stipulation
first draft/to draw up (a first version)
